avalancheActivity.highlights: The old snow is generally considered stable after thaw. Little new snow is in the area.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow subsided and melted in thaw. The remaining snow is mostly considered homogeneous and stable. A little new snow was added in mountains on Sunday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Úrkomulítið á mánudag, norðanátt og kólnar. Lítilsháttar éljagangur á þriðjudag og miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is mostly homogeneous and stable after thaw. New snow on Sunday evening and Monday may form unstable wind slabs.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snow is old, grainy and homogeneous. It has subsided and much melted. A little new snow was added in mountains of Thursday night 21.2. Snowfall is forecast on Sunday evening and Monday, and then new unstable wind slabs might form.

travelAdvisory.comment: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvessir úr NA á sunnudag, með snjókomu til fjalla um kvöldið. Norðlæg átt á mánudag með snjókomu, hiti um frostmark á láglendi. Úrkomuminna og hægari vindur á þriðjudag og miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow has come at higher elevations on top of the old firn in easy winds

travelAdvisory.comment: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Minnkandi NA-átt og úrkoma en áfram N-læg átt með éljum

avalancheActivity.comment: Multiple thin avalanches released in Seldalur and Fannardalur in Norðfjörður on Saturday morning, 22.2. They all started at high elevations on steep slopes. They released in various aspects.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Older snow is mostly considered homogenous and stable. New snow high in mountains may be unstable at first, and in the first sunshine.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snow is old, homogenous and stable. There is little snow left in the lower parts of slopes. On Friday 21.2, snow fell above approx. 500 m, but that snow is expected to have settled in sunshine on Saturday 22.2. On Sunday, snow fell at high elevations. The new snow can be unstable at first.

travelAdvisory.comment: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Older snow is generally considered stable. New thin wind slabs may form in the northern part of the country on Sunday and Monday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Kólnar með lítilsháttar éljagangi í vestanátt á mánudag, en hægum breytilegum vindi á þriðjudag. Þurrt og bjart á miðvikudag.
